revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Weather Institute |image = [[File:Weather Institute.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Weather Institute. |tokens = 26,000 |location = Route 119 }} '''Weather Institute''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !! Base Health !! Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | rowspan=5|<center>N/A || rowspan=5|<center> N/A || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha || rowspan=5|<center> 39,000 |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- ! Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | rowspan=2|<center> [[File:Castform.png|40px]] '''Castform''' || rowspan=2|<center> '''1,820,000''' || rowspan=2|[[File:Aqua_Admin_(shelly).png|40px]] Aqua Admin Shelly || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha || rowspan=2|<center> 910,000 |- | [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |}
*Must have cleared Weather Institute at least once to unlock Castform
